statements: DELETE FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE contract_id = 100 AND counterparty_id = 200;
DELETE FROM DerivativesContracts WHERE trade_execution_date < '2022-01-01' AND asset_class = 'Equities';
DELETE FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1001 AND contract_type = 'Option';
DELETE FROM trade_execution_details WHERE trade_price > 1000 AND trade_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Contracts WHERE contract_id = 1 AND status = 'ACTIVE';
DELETE FROM trade_execution_details WHERE trade_id IN (SELECT trade_id FROM financial_derivatives_contracts WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM trade_history WHERE action_type = 'CANCEL' AND action_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
